Text: Thanks again DarkElf! DCP LIVES ON!
Thanks Elf!  Know that your posts are greatly appreciated!!

Go DCP!!! 

And thanks for sharing TheDarkelf!

Thanks again guys...with all this recent goings on it is nice to see you guys going strong.  The real supporters of the industry.

DCP!

Many many many many Thanks to you guys at DCP. I got back into comics because of you guys. And i not only DL, but i actually buy the books too. What the big two are doing is exactly like what the Music industry is doing: not listening to the customers and/or refusing to work with them.
It's cool to see Gargoyles in the pack.  Is there anyone out there with any of the other slave labor graphics Disney stuff like Wonderland or Haunted Mansion?
Will the missing DCP packs from November be uploaded? Haven't had a chance to download them and now I find out about all the legal notices sent around to the other sites like Z-Cult :(
Thanks as always, DE.  I was worried when ZCult dropped the goodies, and it's great to be able to keep up with my favorites in digital form.
Cheers ears! Loving your work STOP! Right now. Thank you very much!!!!!

long live DCP!!
Like it? BUY IT!

I see some numpty has hacked DCPSearch
How stupid do you get... I tell you these so called hackers should be hung up by their buster browns and tared and feathered.
Anyone know if DCPSearch has a mirror site?

p.s. Thanks to PirateBay for supplying DCP when all around are bending to the law.

Stay way from any Ori - DCP. Their always bunk. You get the comic cover and the next page is a screen shot from the zombie in Pet Semetary, with a  junk message " Like it, Buy it!" Get off your soapbox buddy.
You guys are the best.Thank you,
